column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH: Two------ massage workers were detained at 9:45 pm on September 07
column8: after a complaint from a customer.------According to the victim
column11: he went to the massage therapist and enjoyed the services.------ At 5 pm on the same day he went shopping and found instead of real cash $400 had been replaced with copied ‘ghost’ money. He went to the police who went down to investigate.------After taking  two women in for questioning
column13: and returned the money to the victim. ------POST NEWS
